QuestData.Title: Stonedark Relics
QuestData.Description:
The murlocs managed to steal some of our sacred relics and carry them down into the lower cavern.
While we warm up, do you think you could go find them?
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover the Chain of Resistance, Wheel of Fortitude, and Rod of Bearing.
QuestData.CompletionText: We have possessed these relics for generations until the murlocs put their fishy flippers on them.
QuestData.RewardText: You found them! Not sure how you carried them all at one time...
